corporate.mainSubtitle: As Esas Consultancy, we offer comprehensive consultancy services in data security and privacy.
corporate.section1Text1: As Esas Consultancy, we transform our business partners' operational burdens and legal risks into manageable processes with a proactive approach. From the establishment phase to full institutionalization, we build a complete, auditable, and secure infrastructure so companies can continue their growth journey with confidence.
corporate.section2VisionText: To be a brand recognized for its reliability in the consultancy field, creating difference at both national and international levels.
corporate.section2MissionText: To produce legal, practical, and sustainable solutions by deeply analyzing our business partners' needs. We aim to be a trustworthy guide in helping our clients achieve their goals by demonstrating an approach based on knowledge, experience, and ethical values at every step.
corporate.section3Text1: Every business has its own unique dynamics, culture, and challenges. As Esas Consultancy, we believe that no process can be sustainable without understanding these differences.
corporate.section3Text2: Therefore, the first step of our consultancy begins with truly understanding your business. We analyze your sector, operational structure, and existing risk areas in detail, reporting our findings with measurable data.
corporate.section3Text3: For us, consultancy does not end with a file delivery. We stand by you as an accessible, transparent, and solution-oriented business partner at every stage of the process. Esas Consultancy offers cooperation built on the foundation of trust, transparency, and sustainability, not just regulatory compliance.
corporate.section4Text1: Esas Consultancy applies a confidentiality policy to all information and documents shared from the first meeting, and destroys all documents and notes obtained after the completion of the work.
corporate.section4Text2: Esas Consultancy also generally commits that it will not share client information with anyone, valuing its clients' information.
corporate.section4Text3: Client confidentiality and reliability are among the most fundamental elements of our service quality. We carefully protect this principle in every project.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How long does the KVKK compliance process take?
faq.answer1: The KVKK compliance process varies depending on the size of your company and your current data processing activities. On average, it is completed in 4-8 weeks. We can determine the exact duration after the initial assessment.
faq.question2: What documents should personnel records include?
faq.answer2: According to the Labor Law, personnel records must include; employment contract, identity card copy, diploma or certificate copy, health report, photograph, work start notification and disciplinary records if any. We will provide you with a detailed list.
faq.question3: What stages are followed in the company establishment process?
faq.answer3: The company establishment process includes; determining the company type, preparing the articles of association, depositing capital, applying to the trade registry, tax office registration and SGK procedures. We provide guidance at every stage.
faq.question4: How does the trademark application process work?
faq.answer4: The trademark application process consists of; preliminary research, application file preparation, application to the Turkish Patent and Trademark Office, examination process and registration stages. The process takes an average of 12-18 months.
faq.answer5: Our pricing is determined according to the scope, complexity and duration of the project. We prepare special offers for each of our customers. You can contact us for detailed information.

service1.title: Personnel File Setup and Management
service1.subtitle: Professional personnel file management compliant with labor law
service1.overview:
The foundation of professional HR operations is based on an organized and complete document management system. With this service, we conduct a comprehensive analysis by taking inventory of your company's existing personnel files in line with your business processes and legal requirements. We not only identify deficiencies but also create file templates that include best practices suitable for the nature of each position.

Our goal is to establish an accessible, systematic, and audit-ready archive structure that facilitates the daily operations of your HR department. With our prepared action plan and monitoring system, we transform document management from a complex burden into an integral part of your company's professional management approach.

At this point, we aim to build a corporate identity structure with nearly a hundred document varieties that we have prepared under the headings of definite/indefinite term service contracts, signature declarations, job descriptions, custody records, incident-action detection minutes, leave request and approval forms, overtime and leave tracking schedules, and ultimately personnel regulations.

Identification of missing documents in accordance with Labor Law requirements
Preparation of special file templates for each position
Prioritized action plan and implementation schedule
Documentation system with legal evidence value
process: Analysis of current situation and inventory preparation
Determination of legal requirements and identification of missing documents
Preparation of customized file templates
Creation of implementation plan and establishment of monitoring system
Establishment of continuous improvement and update processes
deliverables: Deficiency detection report and priority ranking

service2.title: KVKK Compliance Package
service2.subtitle: Full compliance with personal data protection legislation
service2.overview:
Personal data management is not only a legal obligation in today's business world but also a matter of corporate reputation and trust. With our KVKK consultancy service, we transform your employee data processing processes into a transparent, reliable, and legislation-compliant structure. We analyze your company's data processing activities to clarify which data is collected on what basis and clarify retention and destruction policies.

In this scope, we make official applications to relevant institutions and organizations, submit VERBIS notifications on behalf of your company, and prepare the 'Data Inventory' to be presented to the institution. Apart from these works, we also prepare information texts, consent forms, and all related documentation provided to your employees, creating a corporate structure integrated with current practices.

In this way, we strengthen your data management processes and provide an infrastructure that will prove that your institution fulfills its data responsibility in the most accurate way in possible audits.
features: Preparation of KVKK compliant information texts
Updating and standardization of explicit consent forms
Preparation of data processing inventory
Determination of retention periods and design of destruction procedures
Documentation that will provide defense power during audit process
process: Analysis of existing data processing activities
Document revision in accordance with KVKK requirements
Preparation of information texts and consent forms
Determination of data inventory and storage policies
Personnel training and initiation of implementation process
deliverables: Data processing inventory and storage policies

service3.title: Audit Preparation & File Improvement Package
service3.subtitle: Comprehensive preparation minimizing administrative sanction risks
service3.overview:
With our 'Audit Preparation & File Improvement' package, we examine your company's HR processes and file structures under a microscope with the most current methodologies and meticulous internal audit approach. With this approach suitable for today's conditions, we classify potential risks and non-compliances according to their severity level and create a comprehensive 'risk map'.

Our aim in this service is to identify weak points without leaving any process to chance and to strengthen them permanently. With our detailed 'Compliance Improvement Report' we prepare, we prioritize issues requiring urgent intervention and provide you with a complete, step-by-step implementable correction schedule. With this meticulous work, we minimize your operational risks and facilitate your providing complete assurance to management.

Identification of issues requiring urgent intervention

Summary evaluation report to be presented to senior management

service4.title: HR Process Management Package and Special Personnel Regulation Preparation
service4.subtitle: Standard HR processes that increase operational efficiency
service4.overview:
The operational efficiency and healthy corporate culture of companies develop depending on how transparent, consistent, and current their HR processes are. With this awareness, contrary to static and stereotyped approaches, we offer the most current and innovative HR practices to your service by blending them with our deep experience.

With our HR Process Optimization service, we first analyze your entire HR lifecycle from recruitment to performance management, from disciplinary processes to leave policies within your current operational structure. As a result of our analysis, we design customized procedures that eliminate uncertainties, increase efficiency, and fully adapt to your company's dynamic structure.

We bring together all of these structured and optimized processes under a comprehensive 'Personnel Regulation' (Company Handbook) specially prepared for your company's operational realities and corporate culture. This document serves not as a static text but as a living and current guide for both managers and employees, strengthening corporate memory and thus ensuring the establishment of a fair and professional ground in HR management.

service5.title: Onboarding and Offboarding Process Management
service5.subtitle: Professional transition processes that protect from legal risks
service5.overview:
Steps taken at the beginning of work and files prepared in accordance with procedures create a foundation that affects the entire working life, preventing many possible problems in the future. With this awareness, we transform all transition processes from the first moment an employee joins the company to the last moment they leave into a professional structure and ensure that your company completes transition processes in the safest way.

With this approach, we design an optimized process for the work start phase that accelerates the new employee's adaptation, ensures that necessary documents are completed without deficiency, and official notifications are made on time. With similar meticulousness, we also meticulously structure the termination processes that are critically important to prevent disputes that may arise in the future. With this professional approach, we minimize operational risks on one hand and provide a respectful transition process where both parties' rights are protected on the other hand.

Balanced procedures for legal risk minimization

service6.title: Service & Employee Contract Template Package
service6.subtitle: Comprehensive contract solutions suitable for various working forms
service6.overview:
Today's business world brings different working models such as project-based, remote, or fixed-term work. This dynamic structure requires that the contracts forming the basis of the relationships that companies establish with both employees and suppliers are flexible, current, and clear.

With this service, we prepare a professional contract template package suitable for various working forms and commercial relationships that your company needs. These templates not only meet legal requirements but also regulate critical issues such as confidentiality, intellectual property, non-competition, and termination conditions in a clear, balanced, and protective manner.

With this service, we provide operational speed to your company, offer you a safe ground in every new business relationship, and provide an easy-to-use contract infrastructure.

service7.title: Company Establishment – Operational Startup Package
service7.subtitle: Comprehensive support for smooth transition from establishment to operation
service7.overview:
Completing the legal process of a newly established company is only the first step of operational success. The real challenge is to quickly become operational immediately after this establishment and to set up the administrative infrastructure correctly from the very beginning. With our 'Operational Startup Package' service, we provide the basic HR and compliance infrastructure that your company will need from the first day it becomes operational.

We prepare all the basic documents you need, from initial recruitment forms to personnel file templates, from basic internal procedures to KVKK preliminary preparation documents. With this service, we enable founders to focus their energy on their main business rather than administrative obligations and increase efficiency. As Esas Consulting, we guarantee that your company's HR foundations are built solidly, completely, and in compliance with legislation from the very beginning.

service8.title: Trademark & Patent Application, Registration, and Protection Process Management
service8.subtitle: We handle all necessary tasks and procedures on your behalf to register and protect your intellectual property rights. By safeguarding all your efforts and assets on your behalf, we enable you to invest more confidently in the future.
service8.overview:
Companies' trademarks, names, and innovations they develop are their most valuable commercial assets. The process of protecting these assets requires end-to-end process management that begins with strategic preliminary preparation, beyond just making an official application.

During this strategic preparation period, we analyze the registration potential and possible conflict risks by conducting comprehensive preliminary research for your trademark or invention. We meticulously prepare your application file by determining the correct classification and, if requested, carry out your official application before the Turkish Patent and Trademark Office. After the application is made, we meticulously manage the entire process covering the publication of the application until obtaining the registration certificate, monitoring bulletins, responding to possible objections from third real/legal persons, and conducting all necessary administrative procedures. After the registration process is completed, the protection phase, which is one of the most important stages, begins. We monitor your registered rights, take necessary steps against possible violations, and monitor renewal periods on your behalf, putting your valuable assets under full guarantee.

Strategic classification and application strategy development
Professional preparation of application files
Registration process monitoring and management system

service9.title: Reporting, Monitoring and Periodic Control System
service9.subtitle: We ensure that all the services we provide work seamlessly with your company's departments and employees, establishing a sustainable system. In this context, we conduct periodic audits and implement a continuous improvement cycle based on the results of our systematic monitoring and reporting.
service9.overview:
The sustainability of new HR systems and process improvements established with our consultancy services is as important as establishing them. Even the best practices can lose their effectiveness over time without regular monitoring and control mechanisms.

With this service, we establish a systematic monitoring and reporting infrastructure for all improvements to be permanent. We determine critical performance indicators (KPIs) such as 'document completion rate' or 'open risk number', design monthly/quarterly/annual periodic audit plans and clear management report formats. Our goal is to enable you to manage your HR and compliance processes based on data, to initiate a continuous improvement cycle, and to guarantee that the gains achieved are permanent.

service10.title: Corporate Training: HR Compliance, KVKK and File Management
service10.subtitle: We provide in-house training to ensure your employees can use the systems in a timely and consistent manner, and we ensure our services operate flawlessly.
service10.overview:
The best designed systems and procedures are as strong as the competence of the teams that implement them. Corporate compliance and operational efficiency can be achieved by transferring this knowledge to practice rather than theoretical knowledge.

With this service, we offer specially designed 'applied' training programs for HR teams and managers. Contrary to boring legislation presentations, we address critical topics such as HR compliance, KVKK, and file management through interactive workshop studies. Our trainings are built on case studies based on your company's realities, practical checklists, and template applications. As a result of our trainings, we aim to ensure that participants move from the 'knowing' level to the 'being able to apply' level and make the acquired competencies an integral part of their daily workflows.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
As Esas Consulting, the security of your personal data is extremely important to us. This privacy policy is prepared to inform you about how your personal data is collected, processed and protected.

Personal Data Collection: When you fill out the contact form on our website, information such as your name, surname, email address and message content is collected.

Data Processing Purpose: The collected data is processed only for the purpose of communicating with you, responding to your requests and improving our service quality.

Data Security: Your personal data is stored on secure servers and protected against unauthorized access. Your data is not shared with third parties.

Your Rights: Within the scope of KVKK, you have the right to access, correct, delete and object to the processing of your data.

Contact: For questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us at info@esasdanismanlik.com.
